website_summaries.verdict: Uses an aluminum construction that delivers durability along with a lightweight feel.
pros: Ships with a clip for attaching to a belt loop or lanyard to keep the pliers close at hand
Handle includes ridges for fingers to help you maintain a good grip
Pliers measure 7.1", making them a perfect size for fishing tasks
Allows for cutting of most fishing line
cons: Pliers may come apart and aluminum may bend under extra stress

customer_reviews.title: and the pliers are very good. I took them fishing in the salt water
customer_reviews.text: The small holder case it comes with isn't the most spectacular, but it does function as intended. However some might choose to swap it for something a little more beefy. However I purchase pliers, not a case, and the pliers are very good. I took them fishing in the salt water, and not a part of them rusted, even after I didn't clean them. So they are built quite well. If I could change something, I would probably dip the handles in plastidip, as they can get pretty slippery in salt water. But all in all, excellent pliers on the cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Thrasherht

customer_reviews.title: Work great, light and strong.
customer_reviews.text: These work great, I wear them on my belt fishing, keeps my fingers away from barracuda's mean jaws. Has a split-ring bit as well which is a great feature to have. The cutter is VERY sharp and works on braided fishing line well and even light single-strand wire. The teeth have a little bit of rust on them but that's my fault for not rinsing them one time I was out. As others have said I do wish that the teeth touched. It's annoying when you want to say pull a knot tight...
customer_reviews.author: Netjirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Very effective for working split rings.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on the kayak. Worked good for opening up split rings when I need to replace broken hooks on the water. Not easy since my eyes and dexterity are pretty bad after pedaling the kayak for miles/hours. Cuts the line well and used it a bit for unhooking fish - when I can't reach my heavy forceps easily. The leash has saved them from falling off the yak a few times as well. I have some more expensive ones and these actually cut better. A little rusting in areas - so keep it rinsed off.
customer_reviews.author: greenscales

customer_reviews.title: Rscellent release tool
customer_reviews.text: Holds hooks firmly with no twisting for very quick fish releases. One quick motion and they are gone. Line cutters are ultra sharp, cutting through 4, 6 pound mono and braid cleanly and effortlessly. The thinner the line the harder they are to cut cleanly and this does the job. The ring opener at the tip works very well but has an added benefit. When releasing a fish, once the hook is caught behind the tip it's a done deal. No way to for the hook to slip out. Great pliers for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Suro

customer_reviews.title: They work great....and no rust so far.
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good for a cheap pair of pliers. There are just a couple of things the engineer could have improved upon. The pliers are always open by spring force. When your hands are covered in fish slim handling these pliers can be a bit tricky. The replaceable working end of the pliers don't really close all the way. This really hasn't been too much of a problem because I use them to take out large hooks from fish and to cut 20-50lb mono. It would have also been nice if the sheath came with a belt clip rather than a belt loop. Again...not really an issue...just my preference. I would still recommend these pliers to anyone I meet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing tool
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are light enough that I forget I am wearing them. They crimp and cut well, and do a nice job of gripping a hook or split ring. The seller has great service also. I asked about buying a new pair of blades and the sent me a whole new pair for free!
customer_reviews.author: Charles R

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: They're ok. Best thing I can say about them is that they don't seem like they'll corrode even in saltwater. They spring open too wide for my needs, which would be fine if the handles weren't so slippery even when dry. Almost more slippery when dry. I might "customize" mine by hack-knurling the handles or something. They're sturdy and the braid cutter does cut nicely, but it's not easy to get the cutter into tight spots. I'm still in search of the perfect braid cutter...
customer_reviews.author: Dan Checkoway

customer_reviews.title: Great saltwater pliers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've put these things through hard use over a year and they still work great. Split ring tooth works great and the line cutter is still doing its job. The lanyard broke after a few months and there is some minimal corrosion at the teeth but the body, spring mechanism, and functionality are still top notch. Can't ask for better for $15. I just ordered a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Epinefren

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing tool
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality tool, heavy weight for it's size, Does everything I expected. The pliers come with a coiled lanyard with a small carabiner clip on the loose end for attaching to a pant loop. The lanyard is attached to the tool with a key ring type of connector. I replaced the key ring connector with another caribiner of equal size so I could remove the lanyard and work with the tool at my tackle table and not deal with the lanyard. Works great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mrgrower

customer_reviews.title: Cut braided line easily, and feel nice in the hands
customer_reviews.text: Cut braided line easily, and feel nice in the hands. The ring splitter is very handy and the other notches are great for holding hooks and jigs. The quality seems good and I have used them on at least 5 saltwater trips. Just make sure to rinse them well after each trip and I expect them to last a long time based on the quality.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: They performed well and would certainly recommend them to others
customer_reviews.text: Used the pliers this weekend on a fishing trip. The cutters cut mono and braid with ease (and the braid cut was clean). The pliers came with an extendable cord and pouch. They performed well and would certainly recommend them to others. From my research, they are one of the lighter weight fishing tools.
customer_reviews.author: AB971

customer_reviews.title: Only thing it really needs is better grip.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I kick myself for not buying some of these sooner. I have bought tons of gear from expensive rods/reels to tons to baits costing more than what you get for use out of your pliers. Especially if you are trying to cut braid. The cutters on these are incredible. I have a sharp pocket knife but these are not only with ease but accurate in cutting close to your knots. I bass fish and so far, its helped get all the hooks out too. Only thing it really needs is better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - pliers exploded while trying to remove hook from jack trevally mouth..
customer_reviews.text: I'm in Cabo San Lucas, Caught a 15lbs jack Trevally this morning, - pliers exploded while trying to remove hook from jack trevally mouth. Now I added a video and a photo..
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Salt Water does rust the teeth a little
customer_reviews.text: It's hard for me to even knock off a star on these great pliers for the cheap price I paid for them. I did decide to knock off one star tho because saltwater does rust the teeth. Now I know that there isn't t a lot that saltwater doesnt rust but If you're gonna make pliers for fishing, they need to not rust since they're gonna get water all over them constantly
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and multiple functions
customer_reviews.text: This fishing plier is great! I just went fishing crappie with it today, it worked perfectly! Since I lost my last fishing plier, I had to carry a common plier, a scissor, and a hook remover. It is too inconvenient. This fishing plier has good quality and multiple functions, it is the best tool for fishing!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Liu

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool. Only thing that bothers me a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool. Only thing that bothers me a little bit is that the cutting edge does not go all the way to the end. So you have to make sure that the line is in the right spot, not a biggie really, but would be a lot easier if you didn't have to pay full attention, but rather could do it blindly so to speak. But overall good tool for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: They aren't high dollar pliers. But awesome for the money. I would have given them 5 stars if the pivot was gold like the photo. Great deal and if they go overboard you can have another set in a day! Hell, order 3 at a time. You can't get a carabiner at west marine for the price of these. Not sure how they will hold up over a season, but if I manage to keep them that long I will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: G. Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They are light weight, cut line with no issues and are a tool every fisherman should have. My husband fishes at least four times a week. He has had these pliers for a couple months and still brags about them to me (I got them as a gift for him). A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: riane bates

customer_reviews.title: Pro quality and finish
customer_reviews.text: Have used it on several fishing trips. It surpassed my expectations. Quality is 'aircraft' level. Nice finish and very easy to use one-handed while holding the rod (I fish alone from a small boat).
customer_reviews.author: John Neary Anker

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the product at the pricing
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and have smooth action. Will see how they hold up, but out of the box, I am very happy with the product at the pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kayak fishing tool!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. They cut like a razor and the leash is key for kayak fishing. Go to YippeeKayak on Instagram to watch me roll my kayak and the pliers are stil there! Thx guys. #Yippeekayak
customer_reviews.author: YippeeKayak

customer_reviews.title: Great & Essential Fishing Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great pliers. Very handy and definitely get the job done. The aluminium is of great quality. The only reasons I did not give these pliers 5 stars are that they are not as pictured as there is no gold on them and the pliers teeth to not completely close together. ​
customer_reviews.author: Rob J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look but Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Mine does'nt close 100%. So it won't pull any line under 80 pound because IT CAN'T grab it. And don't take the little blue carabiner off, it good only for one time. The cutting section went rusty after the first fishing trip... perhaps might as well go to walmart and get a $2 plier.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Luc

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but it feels great in your hand and the materials appear to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it feels great in your hand and the materials appear to be of very good quality. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fishing pliers.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best fishing pliers I have used. The holster is great. I have about 5 sets of these on the boat and in my tackle box. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: This item was perfect and was exactly what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect and was exactly what i was expecting. The item came in no time and was very well packaged and in a great shape. I'm very happy and pleased with the item i received and want to thank the seller for a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. No rush unlike the many supposedly stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. No rush unlike the many supposedly stainless steel pairs I have bought. Light weight so may break over time but when I go to use them they do open.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Marcell

customer_reviews.title: I lost recently my favorite pliers, I saw this and gave them a ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost recently my favorite pliers, I saw this and gave them a try. I’m glad I did it. It feels very light, cuts my braided line like a hot knife on butter! :) I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: Okay tool overall. Needs more grip on the handles ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay tool overall. Needs more grip on the handles and belt clips, rather than a belt loop, on the case. I ended up using plasti-dip to create more grip. Worked pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Will Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice pliers wish it was a little narrower.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pliers. Used them recently on a fishing trip. only complaint is I wish the ring plier tip was narrower. Useless on #4 split rings, tip to big. Great on anything bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nice for cutting line
customer_reviews.text: Nice for cutting line, getting hooks out of the fish and the strap keeps it from falling into the water! The holster has a belt loop to keep it on you at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just As Good As VS Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Used these out in Montauk and unhooked about 20 fish (bass and blues) so far. They held up fine and there's not a spot of rust on them. Most of my friends have VS pliers and these (so far) have held up just as good. The braid cutter works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and work for multiple applications and species of ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered before expected! Good quality and work for multiple applications and species of fish. They do not appear to be bonded, but for the price, will be purchasing another pair
customer_reviews.author: soonerbyx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The very best fishing pliars I have ever used. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: smitty

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great pliers! The included sheath was very cheaply made so it went in the trash. Build quality and design is nice. Works great for making leaders which is why I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: The pliers have held up nicely after perhaps 15 12-hour offshore trips
customer_reviews.text: The pliers have held up nicely after perhaps 15 12-hour offshore trips. No rust, no issues at all with the pliers. The sheath is absolute crap however and is a tattered mess and should have been replaced after 10 trips.
customer_reviews.author: WayneO'

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I guess I had this product a little while and the little blades got damaged very easily but not worth my time and I look for getting new blades can't find them never buy this product
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: Excellentt pliers. Used them to remove hooks out of huge kingfish, cut 80# pp braid with no problems. I really like that they are compact so once setup on my belt they do not interfere with my fishing. Extrememely lightweight. Really my sea go to pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Yanfel V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool..
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool seems well built. Me and the kids will use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: busster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrive in time nice pliers, they are for light use they work good so far
customer_reviews.author: Conrado A. Vega-tostado

customer_reviews.title: Clean cutter for braid
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing. Very high quality. I went fishing today and had to tie mono leader to a braid. My old cutter I used to cut braid was awful. I had to chew through braid and always end up with fluffy ends. These cutters - very light snip and perfectly clean cut. They are a nice gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Dvinin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of pliers so far.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made pliers. I have had many pairs and these are worth the cost. Lots of compliments on the look and feel. Adjustments screw allows you to control resistance as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Fishing pliers..well made and a welcome addition to my tackle box
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The nylon case is not that great. The velcro is too short.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum92629

customer_reviews.title: Used only a couple times but seems to do the job just fine- happy with purchase and
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and as advertised. Used only a couple times but seems to do the job just fine- happy with purchase and seller
customer_reviews.author: speakeasy14

customer_reviews.title: Split ring tooth. I build a LOT of custom lures and the little rings can be a pain. Awesome pliers.
customer_reviews.text: I love the light weight and the very strong split ring tooth as well as the construction of the tool. Great strength and awesome bite on objects.
customer_reviews.author: Mike67

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I highly recommend them. I hang them off my waders and I’ve had no problems with them getting beat up in the surf
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sleckman

customer_reviews.title: Work great but the gripping area rusted a little quicker than ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great but the gripping area rusted a little quicker than expected. Also the sheath isn't the best, harder to use. Altogether, I would buy this item again at this great a price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome anglers tool and works great on braid. Beats any name brand out there and hasn't rusted yet with all my trips in the bay
customer_reviews.author: Fowltails

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pliers
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pliers for the money and can't complain. Quality is there and the line cutter works great too. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Houa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: A great deal of products manufactured over seas seems to have a lack in Quality control. These surprised me. Good quality and decent finish. The jaws seem to be fastened in with a grub/set screw. They may be replaceable but I have not looked a replacement as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Plus he says they work great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. He doesn't have to worry about loosing them now with being able to clip them to his belt. Plus he says they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for sure
customer_reviews.text: Pliers work well and jaws fit together nicely. Color finish is good and the cutters worked on 50 Lb braid without issue. Decent value for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Derk

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Been working great for 2 years in salt water environment
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: nice pliers, i'd say that they are equal to a pair that i had paid $40 for at a local retailer. the color combination that i had received is slightly different from the pair pictured but its no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: yota924x4

customer_reviews.title: Zitrades Fishing Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these Pliers primarily based on the price and the appearance of high quality construction.Very impressed with the quality and function, and for the price, I feel they are great. If there is a negative, it is the cutters appear to be a bit weak. However, I have found that to be common in more expensive pliers I have owned. I plan on purchasing another one in the near future. Overall, I am very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of pliers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of pliers, I used the day after they arrived to remove the treble hook from three strippers I caught (and returned) Excellent pair fo pliers for anyone who fishese salt water.The tether keeps them handy at all times.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Honey

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Arrived quickly. My husband uses it for fishing and also for making his own fishing lures.
customer_reviews.author: BL Illy

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how nice these are
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at how nice these are! Compared to the $80 and up pliers out there i dont know why anyone wouldn't buy these! They even cut through braid like a hot knife through butter! Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product great price. Second time I ordered as the last one was lost at the shore
customer_reviews.author: P. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at an awesome price. What more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: ssstovall

customer_reviews.title: Product has survived multiple dips into salt water and been ...
customer_reviews.text: Product has survived multiple dips into salt water and been stored in a wet (salt water) boat for upwards of 9 hours at a time with no sign of degradation of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Love the pliers
customer_reviews.text: Love the pliers, belt holster works great and is exactly what I wanted. Very accessible and the hook tip makes it easy to get my hook or just grab the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. I think the only way they could be ...
customer_reviews.text: Handles are a little slick. Putting them back in the case requires two hands to get the little tab out of the way - seems somebody could engineer the case a little better. Other than that, they're good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Multi use and solid
customer_reviews.text: No catfish caught yet but i love this for tying my knots and trimming up the line, now bring on the fish!!
customer_reviews.author: virenex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome plyers
customer_reviews.text: These plyers are the bomb had 3 friends order them after they seen them
customer_reviews.author: chad luikart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price. I don't feel it will last forever though.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: great pliers
customer_reviews.text: great pliers! Priced well too. The split ring tab on the end was useful in carrying my salmon after landing so I wouldn't need to touch it with my bare hands! I just used to pliers and pinched it in the mouth!
customer_reviews.author: BRON

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fishing plier!
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple of those aluminum fishing pliers from Zitrades for my father and brother as christmas gift, and they look great. Very well made! the holder and lanyard makes it complete! I hope it is durable as we expect from an aluminum plier. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, been using it on the kayak for salt/fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, been using it on the kayak for salt/fresh water for a few months. No signs of corrosion or any wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very well made pliers. I use them in salt ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made pliers. I use them in salt water and have not had a problem. Just as inexpensive as the plastic ones I usually use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Saltwater Fishing Pliers!
customer_reviews.text: I used these pliers for a few saltwater fishing outings and so far I am impressed. The pliers are constructed very well and the cutting tool works well with mono and braided lines. Definitely a must have for a fisherman's tackle-box!
customer_reviews.author: Quy Van

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, good value. Use it all over the farm as a weekender.
customer_reviews.author: JHock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set Il of pliers will get a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: richard monahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Great Pair of Pliers, they do not just look good in the hand but fit good in the hand too. They also are not to heavy, but have a good solid weight to them. Their function is is just as good and are an all around great pair of pliers/
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: probably the best pliers I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: probably the best pliers I have ever had. Bought another set later on just to have. best pliers for the money, no doubt. cut through braided line with ease.

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few months and they have held up great. I do a lot of saltwater fishing and ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for a few months and they have held up great. I do a lot of saltwater fishing and no rust so far!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pliers.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pliers, have not rusted in the salt water so far.

customer_reviews.text: Nice an lite, so far works great I like them

customer_reviews.text: They look well built and it comes with a nice sheath. Gave as a gift to my dad who fishes from a kayak.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother in law. Looks and feels well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Needed a decent fishing pliers and these seem to be a good product reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: bobu2780

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's a pair of pliers...what more can I say? The pliers work great, and were delivered quickly. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R Spexet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spring keeps the handles open so it doesn't sit in the pouch very well, wants to wiggle out.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and usuablity.
customer_reviews.text: Works very nice, no rust, super ergonomic. Great for any level of fisherman.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy and nice productat a good price good price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: For $17 these are outstanding. Exceptional quality, far beyond what I expected. Excellent value.

customer_reviews.title: used for only a few fishing trips and tried to ...

customer_reviews.author: MarkP

customer_reviews.title: Love that these have a clip on them
customer_reviews.text: Love that these have a clip on them, so that you can clip them to seat in the boat. That way they can't "accidentally drop" in the river when your son decides to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pliers. Have used several times & work flawlessly

customer_reviews.text: Repeat customer. Liked the first set so much, I ordered sets for my friends.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing quality for the price. Way better then I expected . Cuts everything with ease.
customer_reviews.author: A SOSA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pliers really like the carry case and wrist strap

customer_reviews.title: The pliers are pretty nice and useful
customer_reviews.text: The pliers are pretty nice and useful. Along with the holster and extension cable; they're almost unbeatable for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Not actually as seen in the picture, theres no yellow and kinda feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Brulinski Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and feel
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Very nice looking and feel. Sharp enough to cut braid line! No idea how long it will last but good value for the price so far.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Martin

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: seems like a good quality product. I just got it so can't speak to the long term durability. My only complaint is the lack of a small peg or clip that can be engaged/ disengaged with the thumb or something to hold the pliers in a closed position
customer_reviews.author: Alan E.

customer_reviews.title: Great pliers. Very sturdy and has the features I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pliers. Very sturdy and has the features I need for fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for $20. Over $25 would be pushing it. Cuts braid with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Waves & Trails

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got them because I fish Saltwater, only thing I have found that is in the least bit problematic, is they don't cut line and leaders as well as I would have liked, but I am satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: william beville

product_meta.title: ZITRADES Fishing Pliers Aluminum Saltwater Sheath Braid Cutter FP-20 Fish Tool Holder with Lanyard from
feature_bullets: Body of the Gripper is made of Special Deluxe Aluminum.
High density skidproof handle. more portable, comfortable use.
Lightweight and bright, Essential fishing equipment!
With Holder which has a belt loop and lanyard (never leave on the beach again)
